SocialMediaPosting.headline: Ms. Catherine Zhang’s Story - Pittsburgh Educator - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope the world realizes that kids are our future and education needs both humility and grace…”

– Ms. Catherine Zhang, Head Teaching Fellow @HGSE https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2021/word-realizes-kids-future-education-humility-grace/
